# Kostadin Devedzhiev – Profile Summary

## 🧑‍💻 Professional Summary

**Software Engineer** at **Stellar Cyber** with expertise in:
- Natural Language Processing (NLP)
- Human-Centered AI
- UI/UX Design
- Intelligent Interactive Systems  
Focused on building AI interfaces that enhance human-machine interaction through language, vision, and reasoning.

---

## 🎓 Education

### **Stony Brook University**
- **B.S. in Computer Science & Applied Mathematics and Statistics**
- Specialization: Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
- Computer Science Honors Program
- **GPA:** 3.89 / 4.00, **Summa Cum Laude**

### **University of Hawaii at Hilo**
- National Student Exchange Program
- **GPA:** 3.97 / 4.00

---

## 🔬 Work & Research Experience

### **Stellar Cyber** | *Software Engineer* (2022–Present)
- Developed **Open XDR Investigator**, a GenAI cybersecurity assistant with Elasticsearch and multi-chart visualization via natural language.
- Built **WebSocket pipelines** for real-time communication and reduced response time by 70%.
- Created **GPT-based agents** for log analysis, metrics evaluation, and more.
- Designed and maintained **Mixpanel-based analytics**, driving UX improvements.
- Achieved over 90% test coverage; reduced bugs by 34% YoY.

### **Stony Brook University** | *NLP Research Assistant*
- Designed **Recursive QA**, an annotation framework based on parse tree-derived QA tasks.
- Developed a full-stack annotation web app with user management and analytics.
- Reached 80% agreement rate and 25-second annotation speed.

### **University of Hawaii at Hilo**
- Created **semi-automatic image annotation tool** for invasive species identification via drone imagery and CNNs.
- Developed API for **holographic fan** control; built Data Viz lab website.

### **Vivansa** | *Software Engineering Intern*
- Improved CRM UI and resolved database inconsistencies via structured data cleaning.

---

## 🧑‍🏫 Teaching Experience

- **Stony Brook TA** – AMS 210: Applied Linear Algebra
- **UH Hilo Grader** – Linear Algebra & Intro to Computer Science

---

## 📚 Publication

### *Motional EMF in Ellipses*
- **European Journal of Physics (2020)**
- Developed numerical models for EMF induced in deformed elliptical loops.
- DOI: [10.1088/1361-6404/ABB066](https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6404/ABB066)

---

## 💡 Projects

### **GONEXT**
- Real-time League of Legends assistant powered by GPT-4o and Riot API.
- Provides strategies, synergies, and matchups based on live game data.
- [GitHub](https://github.com/kostadindev/GONEXT)

### **Knowledge Base Builder**
- Converts documents, websites, and GitHub content into Markdown for RAG and LLMs.
- [GitHub](https://github.com/kostadindev/knowledge-base-builder)

### **Recursive QA**
- NLP annotation framework using QA pairs from parse trees.
- [GitHub](https://github.com/kostadindev/Recursive-QA)

### **Deep Gestures**
- Real-time CNN for gesture recognition on Arduino BLE microcontrollers.

### **I Want to Redistrict**
- Web app visualizing fair districting plans using US Census data and stochastic algorithms.

---

## 🧠 Research Interests

- Human-Machine Interaction
- Human-Inspired AI
- Prompt Engineering
- NLP Annotation Interfaces
- Interactive AI Systems

## 🛠 Technical Skills

- **Languages**: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C
- **Frontend**: React, Angular, Tailwind
- **Backend**: FastAPI, Flask, Node.js, Express
- **Databases**: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, Pinecone
- **ML/DL**: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch
- **DevOps**: Docker
- **Certifications**: IBM Generative AI with LLMs
